---
title: "Intro"
---

The AxeTech Modern Data Platform (AT-MDP) provides a dedicated environment for organsiations to quickly gain insights from their data.

Key benefits of the Modern Data Platform include:

* AT-MDP can be built within the customers own cloud environment for complete control and ease of integration with data.
* Automatically scales to your usuage and you only pay for what you use.
* Is fast to setup allowing customers to start working with their data sooner.
* Leverages industry leading vendors and methodologies.
* Data security and governance structures are included to help manage how data is accessed.

If you want a platform that provides access to your data quickly and securely so you can get on with exploring and understanding your business then AT-MDP is for you.
